body.name: Sceptre Curved 24.5-inch Gaming Monitor up to 240Hz 1080p R1500 1ms DisplayPort x2 HDMI x2 Blue Light Shift Build-in Speakers, Machine Black 2023 (C255B-FWT240)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 18 mins
features: 240Hz Refresh Rate: Stay above the pack with 240Hz, giving you an edge in performance as frames transition instantly.Specific uses for product - Gaming
1ms Response Time: Colors fade and illuminate instantly with a 1ms response time, eliminating ghosting and piecing together precise imagery during action-packed scenes and gaming.
1500R Curvature: The 1500R degree curved design immerses you into all of the action no matter where you choose to sit in the room.

AMD FreeSync Premium: By accelerating the frame rate to at least 120Hz at 1080P FHD resolution and delivering low latency to prevent visible delay in data processing, AMD FreeSync Premium allows gameplay to reach the highest echelons of performance.
Built-In Speakers: Perfectly suited to work & gaming settings, built-in speakers deliver robust & smooth audio while saving space on your desk.
body.description: 24.5" Curved Gaming 240Hz Monitor 1920 x 1080 Full HD Resolution Up to 240Hz Refresh Rate 1ms MPRT AMD Freesync Premium 1500R Curvature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice monitor for a nice price
reviews.reviewText: I will say this is the first monitor I have ever bought. Hook up easy, picture fantastic, games look great, a friend of mine is an av tech and says the monitor and refresh rate for the price is worth it. Just had to do some fine tuning but overall great product great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this monitor for about two weeks now. I primarily bought it because my old monitor died and I wanted a good monitor to play FFXIV with. This picture quality on this thing is stellar, better than my 32" Curved Samsung, and so far I've been impressed with the visuals for all my gaming. The base is larger than I anticipated so if you're planning to use a monitor stand a normal size one won't work, but it's a very sturdy base! All in all would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this monitor. I just got a new PC & wanted something nice yet affordable. The quality is amazing. Clear. Games looks fabulous on it. I’m glad I went with the larger screen. Although with gaming I cannot keep it on full wide screen because I can’t see everything going on but for browsing or other uses it’s so nice to have. Definitely recommend! Easy to set up & functions with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Box came with everything you need to set up. Includes a wall mount and stand, and the screwdriver needed for them. Incredibly easy setup, and works like charm. Good quality, and overall very worthy purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Immersive Gaming Experience: Sceptre Curved 24.5-inch
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Sceptre Curved 24.5-inch Gaming Monitor at a great sale price of $130, and I must say, it's been a pleasant surprise. The display is remarkably smooth, and the setup was a breeze. I particularly appreciate the wealth of customization options available, allowing me to tailor the monitor to my preferences. The added touch of a color-changing LED at the back of the monitor adds a nice aesthetic touch to my gaming setup.One downside worth noting is the relatively weak built-in speakers, making headphones a necessity for a more immersive audio experience. However, this seems to be a common trade-off for monitors in this price range.The monitor's ability to reach up to 240Hz is a standout feature, and the curved screen provides an immersive experience without feeling overly stretched. The colors are vibrant, adding depth to the visuals and enhancing my overall gaming experience.At this price point, the Sceptre C255B-FWT240 offers impressive value, especially for those seeking a high-refresh-rate monitor with an immersive curved display. It's a worthy addition to any gaming setup, and despite the minor audio limitation, its performance and visual quality make it a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is a great addition to an immersive setup. Images are crisp at 1440p, and good placement can ensure an enjoyable experience. RGB light in the back works fine and is a nice touch, albeit rarely seen if your desk is in a corner.3440 offers enhanced multitasking capabilities and all modern games support this resolution (older games can be stretched or played at native resolution) and there are many wallpapers available. If you stream, you will have to make some sacrifices for a pleasant viewing experience since most users probably have 1920x1080.This unit came with a single dead pixel, and it shows up green most of the time. I saw another review that mentioned this same issue when I ordered it, so take into consideration. It is mostly unnoticeable except on darker scenes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice curved monitor for this price
reviews.reviewText: Very good curved gaming monitor on a budget. Some bad reviews made me nervous but I'm glad I bought this. I have had no issues and no dead pixels. Image is sharp and beautiful. Colors are amazing. However the speaker is not great but that isn't why I bought it, so it's just an extra feature if you want to remove headphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for gaming with an annoying sleep problem
reviews.reviewText: First of all the monitor performs great when it's on. Gaming is so smooth and immersive and like night and day coming from a 60hz monitor. The issue like some others have reported is when the display goes to sleep. Moving the mouse or pressing a key on the keyboard doesn't wake up the display. I have to press the power button several times to get it to power off then I can power it back on and it will detect the input. Tech support says there is no firmware update available. If you can live with that annoying issue then I would recommend this for the price.

La verdad tenia tiempo queriendo uno y salio a muy buen precio, se ve genial solo el único detalle fue que cuando lo abrí al sacarlo la bolsa donde esta la pantalla estaba húmeda, se podía sentir la humedad en las manos cuando tome la bolsa para sacarlo, esta era la bolsa que protege el monitor, eso me di cuenta hasta que ya lo tenia instalado, decidí quedármelo esperando que no falle, el monitor no estaba húmedo o mojado y no tenia marcas, solo era la bolsa exterior, quien sabe donde los guarden o si fue en frontera pero espero que tengan mas cuidado porque como quiera no vale 3 pesos, son cosas relativamente caras...
Just bought it and I’ve got to say it looks and feels unreal! 100% recommend buying!
Me parecio una exelente compra la verdad el tiempo de respuesta es muy bueno tiene buen color y viene con displayport incluido para mi es un 10 de 10

For the price point and the fact that you can pay in installments through Amazon, this is a very affordable wide Curved monitor. I was impressed by the size. The quality of the picture is pretty good but you can see that it's not the best, obviously I was aware of this when I brought this monitor. It's still really good quality, but I guess I am spoiled by my other uhd screen which is top of the benchmark. The monitor allows extra space for your work and I am glad I got it as I was able to replace two screens with one. I will update this review in 6 months as I have only been using the monotir for a few days now and all seems great

Good value, overall pretty good monitor. Only complaint is that it doesn't have a sleep mode. There is sleep mode in the menu, but it turns off the monitor completely when Windows screensaver comes on. Every other monitor I've used will wake up automatically, this one you have to press the power button every time. Other than that annoyance, I am happy with the monitor.
